Class MainWindowController

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.controllers.MainWindowController
@Component public class MainWindowController extends Object
This controller sets up the UI for the main window of the application. The user can perform various actions in this window, such as selecting one or more rows of data to mark for removal from the opened file and updating an individual byte at a particular offset in the file. From this window, the user can click on the View All Changes button to view all the queued changes that will be applied to the file when the Save button is clicked and also the Embed Text button to insert or append text to the file. A label is located beneath the last row of buttons in this window, and it gives feedback to the user when a file is opened or text is entered in one of the three text fields.
See Also:
  • AllChangesWindowController
  • EmbedMessageWindowController

  • Constructor Details

    • MainWindowController

      public MainWindowController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the UI elements in the main window. When the application is first launched, the Open File dialog will appear. After the user selects a file, listeners will be attached to all the buttons and text fields. The file contents list view will display the contents of the first several bytes of the opened file.

    • syncScrollbars

      public void syncScrollbars()
      Syncs the scrollbars of the row numbers list view and the file contents list view so that if the user scrolls with the mouse or drags the scrollbar in one list view, the other list view will scroll at the same time together.

    • onHelpBtnClicked

      public void onHelpBtnClicked() throws IOException
      Called when the Help button is clicked. Displays a help page that is hosted in an Amazon S3 bucket.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are problems opening the help page.

    • onOpenFileBtnClicked

      public void onOpenFileBtnClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
      Called when the Open File button is clicked. The Open File dialog will appear, allowing the user to select a file. If no file or the same file is selected, the method will simply return.
      Parameters:
      event - Represents the click action on the Open File button and provides information about the source of the event.

    • onUpdateBtnClicked

      public void onUpdateBtnClicked()
      Called when the Update button is clicked. Queues up an UPDATE change for the byte located at the row and column that the user entered in the respective text field and then refreshes the file contents list view to reflect the change that will be applied to the file when the Save button is clicked. See onSaveChangesBtnClicked().

    • onMarkToRemoveBtnClicked

      public void onMarkToRemoveBtnClicked()
      Called when the Mark to Remove button is clicked. Queues up REMOVE changes for the selected row(s), then enables the Undo, View All Changes, Clear All Changes, and Save Changes buttons.

    • onUndoBtnClicked

      public void onUndoBtnClicked()
      Called when the Undo button is clicked. The latest change that is queued up will be removed from the list.

    • disableButtons

      public void disableButtons()
      Disables the Undo, View All Changes, Mark to Remove, Clear All Changes, and Save Changes buttons.

    • onViewAllChangesBtnClicked

      public void onViewAllChangesBtnClicked()
      Called when the View All Changes button is clicked. A new window will pop up in which the user can view all the types of queued changes that will be applied to the file when the user clicks on the Save Changes button. See AllChangesWindowController and saveChanges(boolean).

    • onClearAllBtnClicked

      public void onClearAllBtnClicked()
      Called when the Clear All Changes button is clicked. Removes all queued changes and restores the file contents list view to the initial state when the file is first opened.

    • onEmbedTextBtnClicked

      public void onEmbedTextBtnClicked()
      Called when the Embed Text button is clicked. A new window will pop up in which the user can type a string that will be embedded into the file, either replacing existing bytes in the file or inserting bytes anywhere in the file. See EmbedMessageWindowController.

    • onSaveChangesBtnClicked

      public void onSaveChangesBtnClicked()
      Called when the Save button is clicked. See saveChanges(boolean).

    • saveChanges

      public void saveChanges(boolean updateUi)
      Processes all the queued changes against the file. This process occurs on a virtual thread. Once it is complete, the MD5 and SHA-256 digests are recalculated (each on a separate platform thread), and the UI elements are updated on the JavaFX Application Thread.
      Parameters:
      updateUi - True to update the UI elements, false to not update them.

    • showConfirmDialog

      public static boolean showConfirmDialog(String message)
      Displays a dialog box in which the user can choose to confirm or cancel a particular action.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display in the dialog box.
      Returns:
      True if the user clicked on ButtonType.YES, false if the user clicked on ButtonType.NO or closed the dialog box without making a selection.

    • setAllChangesWindowController

      @Autowired public void setAllChangesWindowController(AllChangesWindowController allChangesWindowController)
      Sets an instance of an AllChangesWindowController object.
      Parameters:
      allChangesWindowController - An instance of an AllChangesWindowController.

    • setEmbedMessageWindowController

      @Autowired public void setEmbedMessageWindowController(EmbedMessageWindowController embedMessageWindowController)
      Sets an instance of an EmbedMessageWindowController object.
      Parameters:
      embedMessageWindowController - An instance of an EmbedMessageWindowController.

    • setHexEditorService

      @Autowired public void setHexEditorService(HexEditorService hexEditorService)
      Sets an instance of a HexEditorService object.
      Parameters:
      hexEditorService - An instance of a HexEditorService.
